::Killfest::

Killfest frowns, him and the rest of his team following KitKat. "Hmm. 
It sounds interesting, but I don't plan on dying anytime soon. If you 
don't mind, my DNA will remain with me."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> She glanced at Drillbit. "Please go to my quarters. I'll talk to 
you 
> when I'm done here."
> 
> She walked down the hall with Killfest."Well, I will need DNA 
> samples. We take them of all the bots here. You see, in the event 
of 
> your unfortunate death, we can bring you back so to speak. It's 
> wonder how we have the technology now a days. You see, if we can 
> salvage your original spark chamber, we can bring you back. In a 
way. 
> It's so that even in a horrible battle, we shall not lose our 
troops. 
> Say one of your team is killed. We can bring him back through a 
> prossess called cloning. But we must extact living DNA and keep it 
> untill that time. Without the spark chamber we can't do it either. 
So 
> your troops would have to die first, then we can bring them back.  
> It's not hard and I can show you the prossess if you wish."
